message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more upfront since the value decreases for me over time.
I'll take a bit more since the value doesn't decrease for me
Bob, this is my final offer. It's a good deal considering the time pressure and inflation working against me.
I'm not feeling the time pressure, so I'll take a bit more
Bob, let's be real. This is getting ridiculous. I'm losing money every round, and this back-and-forth is pointless. 50/50 is the only fair outcome now.
